item.title: Asus Maximus VI Gene â€“ Error 55
item.description: It’s been quite a while since I built a computer but I decided to give it a try for a new hypervisor/NAS box at home. I picked up an Asus Maximus VI Gene motherboard since it had some good parts installed and it seems to work well with Linux. This was my first time doing water cooling for the CPU and I picked up a Seidon 240M after getting some recommendations.
